snippet: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying"...

headline.main: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'
headline.print_headline: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'

lead_paragraph: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying" or "the opposition."
